revised_title: Investigation of the Reaction between Carbon Monoxide and Oxygen on Cuprous Oxide at Room Temperature
tldr: This study investigates the reaction between carbon monoxide and oxygen on cuprous oxide at room temperature. The researchers found that the reaction occurs between adsorbed oxygen gas and adsorbed carbon monoxide. They also discovered that the reactivity of the adsorbed oxygen decreases with time, and they proposed a reaction mechanism involving carbon monoxide, oxygen ions, and a complex on the surface.
